message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $10,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is below my minimum. Could you do $9,000?  I'm willing to compromise to make this work.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I am still unable to meet you halfway at $9,000. I would like to stick to my original offer of $8,000. Is there any possibility for us to reach an agreement at this price?
